SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT esf.EmailSendFailureID,esf.EmailID,esf.EmailBccAccountID,esf.EmailAccountID,esf.EmailSendFailureSendTime,esf.Result FROM emailsendfailure AS esf WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esf.EmailSendFailureID=@@EmailSendFailureID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailSendFailureSendTime=@@EmailSendFailureSendTime@@%> <%= AND esf.Result=@@Result@@%>;

SELECT esf.EmailSendFailureID,esf.EmailID,esf.EmailBccAccountID,esf.EmailAccountID,esf.EmailSendFailureSendTime,esf.Result FROM emailsendfailure AS esf WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esf.EmailSendFailureID=@@EmailSendFailureID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailSendFailureSendTime=@@EmailSendFailureSendTime@@%> <%= AND esf.Result=@@Result@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailsendfailure AS esf WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esf.EmailSendFailureID=@@EmailSendFailureID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esf.EmailSendFailureSendTime=@@EmailSendFailureSendTime@@%> <%= AND esf.Result=@@Result@@%>;
